body_html:
I've implemented this feature, albeit with a different API. It is a bit complex, but hopefully more convenient for module implementors.
I didn't create a PR because tests are not done yet, and I'm not sure whether the proposed API is OK.
Could someone review the diff and give some feedback?

body:
I've implemented this feature, albeit with a different API. It is a bit complex, but hopefully more convenient for module implementors.
I didn't create a PR because tests are not done yet, and I'm not sure whether the proposed API is OK.
Could someone [review the diff](https://github.com/emilmelnikov/pytorch/commit/bf610c8e29d8eb4b3a67fe96b30e7384a99da187#diff-527b04fec26e044c060ad28b22e842beR872) and give some feedback?
